website_summaries.verdict: Built to withstand the worst weather conditions nature can throw at you, the Super Heavy Duty tarp will protect your property for a long time.
pros: Available in a vast array of sizes
cons: “UV resistant” isn’t as good as UV proof

customer_reviews.title: They only have a 30 day warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike - I had my tarp installed over my camper and after 7 months , where the seems are glued (not stitched) it came apart and ripped all the way down from 1 end to the other. Make sure the tarp you ordered is made of good craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Clenneyj

customer_reviews.title: Good tarp
customer_reviews.text: I did manage to rip a few grommets off right away.
customer_reviews.author: RIVERBOY

customer_reviews.title: Good Tarp
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Thick, tarp material is durable, withstands branches falling on it, use for multiple applications... Cons: Hard to unfold/fold, attachment holes around outside are not durable (had a few tear),...
customer_reviews.author: Kris Curek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty tarp. Used it to cover the pool. Better quality than your average tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good and durable
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this over my above ground pool because it's sturdier than actual pool covers. Working great!
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA

customer_reviews.title: The grommets didnt last 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: It didnt last 24 hours. One good night of gusty wind and all the grommet ripped right out. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to pad anything with sharp corners before covering it with the tarp.
customer_reviews.text: I like how heavy duty the tarp material is but after the first wind I noticed that everywhere my equipment below the tarp had a sharp corner the tarp is now ripped open. I was quite upset!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty tarp. It is a lot thicker than the tarp it replaced and was the same price
customer_reviews.author: Skytx

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to give you my email. It’s grow@bellsouth.net Thanks, vicki logan
customer_reviews.author: vicki Logan

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy duty as I was hoping...
customer_reviews.text: In used for less than 30 days and already showing degradation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Shopper

product_meta.title: Xpose Safety 30' x 40' Super Heavy Duty 16 Mil Brown Poly Tarp Cover - Thick Waterproof, UV Resistant, Rot, Rip and Tear Proof Tarpaulin with Grommets and Reinforced Edges
feature_bullets: EXTRA THICK & STRONG: The high quality of this protective tarp is amazing: it has a 16 mil thickness, 8oz per square yard, and a 16 x 16 weave count. This has the strength and durability you need.
ALL WEATHER PROTECTION: Rain or shine, snow or wind this heavy tarp can handle it all! It is UV resistant, water proof and weather proof, and can withstand storms and the elements outdoors.
TIE IT DOWN EASILY: Metal grommets spaced every 18 inches or 1.5 feet and at each corner allow this poly tarp to be tied down and secured simply. Create a "tent" for camping, fairs and more!
MULTIPURPOSE USE: Cover and protect your car, or wood and building materials at construction sites; keep floors clean using this is a drop sheet when painting or polishing - the uses are endless.
THE BEST AROUND: Made from polyethylene, this material is made to last. Don't get tired of replacing torn, worn-out plastic tarps, use one that offers the best protection and is designed to last.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars18 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
